name: Friday night funkin for mobile (read desc.)
name_original: Friday night funkin for mobile (read desc.)
description:
This project will work even on PCs and chromebooks, but this is mainly focused on phones, for most chromebooks and for chromebook tablets, it is touch supported, and it has decreased quality sprites so they can show on lower end phones. By the way check out my other project: https://chromebook-gamerwastaken.itch.io/friday-night-funkin-optimized-for-chrom... By the way, The source code is part of phykro, I only do this to continue updating his project and optimize it even more so please give phykro credit for the source code and not me thank you. 

v0.0.3 re-added the bottom dlior people in week 5 (since it looked ugly without them and somehow made the arrows a little stuttery on low end devices without them) and same thing happened with the curtains in week 1 and the building lights in week 3, but atleast I deleted some usless diles (like the ludum dare prototype images) to decrease load times and make the game run kind of better, and also returned the car in week 4 and even added the random numbers (the ones that randomly show in the girlfriend's sprite) were re-added cuz of the same reason.
